title.narrative: Public awareness on employment of persons with disabilities raised

actual.value: Central Registry is under preparation, there are no inquiries from Registry users yet. No change from baseline status.

title.narrative: Percentage of centrally maintained records of socially insured individuals shared by all social insurance and tax agencies
Communication campaigns developed and implemented (SURS, CDCCU, disability employment)
Share of beneficiaries satisfied with responsiveness of the grievance redress mechanism
Percentage of persons assessed outside Skopje (out of those residing outside Skopje), who were issued disability certificates or formal rejection decisions in the previous month
Proportion of insured population whose social insurance information is centrally available to all social insurance agencies.
Average time to transfer second pillar funds to individual accounts
Proportion of disability certificate applicants during the past months who had at least one previously issued and currently valid valid disability certificate.
Proportion of individual pension service and earnings records in PIOM that are consolidated
Percentage of persons who had check-ups as part of their disability assessments, out of those who were issued disability certificates during the previous month

target.value: Actuarial department fully staffed and operational.

actual.value: Consultants to perform the PIONM's functional review contracted

title.narrative: Law on Employment of Persons with Disabilities enacted

baseline.value: Current law mainly treats employment through sheltered companies.

actual.value: Background analysis prepared, policy discussions underway, drafting of the Law started

title.narrative: List of jobs declared as hazardous and arduous (Extended Service Period /ESP/ list) revised and enacted

target.value: ESP list revised and enacted (through pension legislation)

title.narrative: Central coordination unit for unified disability (CDCCU) functional
Single unified registry of socially insured individuals developed and functional
Single registry of persons with disabilities developed and functional

actual.value: No change from baseline value. Selection of consultant to develop the Registry underway.

title.narrative: Average time to issue a disability certificate
Enacted unified methodology for disability assessment and determination

actual.value: No change from the baseline status.

title.narrative: Share of citizen engagement activities, which result in inputs incorporated in the project design.
